description:
net: don't return nil interface address on netbsd

On NetBSD routing sockaddrs for interface address contain sockaddr_dl.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

Please take another look.

On 2013/01/20 06:16:44, mikio wrote:
> Hello mailto:golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: mailto:golang-dev@googlegroups.com),
> 
> Please take another look.

Your change looks good, but I don't know enough about the problem to speak with authority.

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go

*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=77908f15b2b3 ***

net: don't return nil interface address on netbsd

On NetBSD routing sockaddrs for interface address contain sockaddr_dl.

R=dave, rsc
CC=golang-dev
https://codereview.appspot.com/7085064

subject: code review 7085064: net: don't return nil interface address on netbsd
